name: Mary

responses.Big Footprint: Those would fit yes, maybe you should give me them.
responses.Small Footprint: Not mine, way too small for me.
responses.Glasses: Not sure why it matters but yes.
responses.Bag: Not mine, I already have a bag.
responses.Lipstick: Yes ,I have just got some new lipstick actually... Now where did I put it
responses.Dark Hair: No my hair is not particularly dark.
responses.Erotic Novel: Where did you get that?! Give that back!
responses.Broken Mobile Phone: Hey that might be mine! But it's badly damaged. I can't really tell.
responses.Car Keys: Why would I have a car of that make? Ew!

noneResponses: Sorry I am far too busy for you
I really don't feel the need to help you.

motives.Colin: I caught him trying to curse my earlobe.
motives.Diana: That hair was an eyesore. I couldn't bear to look at it for another second.
motives.Lily: She was wearing the same dress I was... and looked better in it!
motives.Mike: It's not my fault! He beat me in a spelling test in primary school.
motives.Will: What kind of whackjob would make small talk about sound waves.
